column4: hey, im using these instructions:  http://www.torproject.org/docs/debian.html.de and getting a permission denied error at the update command, any suggestions_
sudo doesnt seem to be working...how to i login as root?
here is my error msg:  Unable to lock the administration directory (/var/lib/dpkg/), are you root?
arand...i used sudo and got that msg
Are you running another app that is managing packages?
are there spaces in the filename?
what's the output of ls -ld Incoming\ Torrents/
I'm just confirming you're the user you believe you are :)
edbian, you shouldn't need sudo if you're changing permissions on files you own
